metadata.name: Spectrum
metadata.description:
A humanoid figure is surrounded by a magnificent assortment of colorful glass fragments, each of which stands in for a treasured memory or work of art from the figure's history. The shards glitter and dazzle in the light, producing a stunning array of colors and tints that dance about the figure as if it were alive with feeling.
 "Spectrum" delivers a profound contemplation on memory and the lasting effects of creativity and artistic expression on the human soul through this visual exhibition.
